articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Gains in RIL, banking stocks buoy Nifty above 17,000 - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, Power Grid, Asian Paints, Bajaj Finance and Bharti Airtel were the top gainers, up about 0.5-1%. NTPC, Kotak Bank, Tata Steel, RIL and Infosys also opened with gains. Whereas, M&M, Titan, ITC, Axis Bank and HUL opened with cuts.
articles.content: Indian equity indices opened marginally higher on Monday amid mixed global cues, led by index heavyweight Reliance Industries, banking and financial stocks.Nifty 50 index rose 60 points or 0.36% to 1… [+2710 chars]
